Santa_Barbara.Hill\u2013Carrillo Adobe:
The Hill–Carrillo Adobe, also known as Carrillo Adobe, was built in 1825-26. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1986., and is a California Historical Landmark site (#721) as well.
It is a U-shaped building consisting of original rectangular 1825-26 section that faces the street and two wings added in the 1900s.
